resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157113</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157113</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2706</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Warm and cold fronts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warme und Kaltfronten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Avants chauds et froids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Partes dianteiras mornas e frias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parti anteriori calde e fredde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θερμά και κρύα μέτωπα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Frentes calientes y fríos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation and comparison of warm and cold fronts and the way in which cloud formation occurs as a result of this.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">meteorology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cloud formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation und ein Vergleich der warmen und 
Kaltfronten und der Methode, in denen Wolke Anordnung resultierend aus
diesem auftritt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation et une comparaison des avants 
chauds et froids et de la voie dans lesquels la formation de nuage se 
produit en raison de ceci.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation e uma comparação das partes 
dianteiras mornas e frias e da maneira em que a formação da nuvem 
ocorre em conseqüência desta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione e un confronto delle parti 
anteriori calde e fredde e del modo in cui la formazione della nube si
presenta come conseguenza di questa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα και μια σύγκριση των θερμών και κρύων 
μετώπων και του τρόπου στους οποίους ο σχηματισμός σύννεφων 
εμφανίζεται ως αποτέλεσμα αυτού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación y una comparación de los frentes 
calientes y fríos y de la manera en los cuales la formación de la 
nube ocurre como resultado de esto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meteorologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wolke Anordnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">météorologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">formation de nuage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">meteorologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">formação da nuvem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meteorologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione della nube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετεωρολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχηματισμός σύννεφων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">meteorología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">formación de la nube</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
